GSD.description:
fs: fix UAF/GPF bug in nilfs_mdt_destroy

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.1 by commit 2a96b532098284ecf8e4849b8b9e5fc7a28bdee9. For more details please see the references link.
